code: import axios from'axios';export function setSkills(){return function(dispatch){return axios.get('/skills').then(function(skillsData){return dispatch({type:'SET_GLOBAL_SKILLS',payload:skillsData.data});}).catch(function(err){return console.log(err);});};}export function setUserInfo(username){return function(dispatch){return axios.get("/users/".concat(username,"/")).then(function(userData){return dispatch({type:'SET_USER_DATA',payload:userData.data});}).catch(function(err){return console.log(err);});};}export function getNotifications(username){return function(dispatch){return axios.get("/users/".concat(username,"/")).then(function(userData){dispatch({type:'GET_NOTIFICATIONS',payload:userData.data.notifications});}).catch(function(err){return console.log(err);});};}export function setProjects(){return function(dispatch){return axios.get('/projects').then(function(jobsData){return dispatch({type:'SET_PROJECTS',payload:jobsData.data});}).catch(function(err){return console.log(err);});};}export function getUsers(){return function(dispatch){return axios.get('/users').then(function(usersData){return dispatch({type:'GET_USERS',payload:usersData.data});}).catch(function(err){return console.log(err);});};}export function getJobs(){return function(dispatch){return axios.get('/jobs').then(function(jobsData){jobsData.data=jobsData.data.sort(function(a,b){return b.project.isPremium-a.project.isPremium;});dispatch({type:'GET_JOBS',payload:jobsData.data});}).catch(function(err){return console.log(err);});};}export function removeFilters(skill){return{type:'REMOVE_FILTER',payload:skill};}export function removeJobFilter(skill){return{type:'REMOVE_JOB_FILTER',payload:skill};}export function selectWorkers(skill){return{type:'SELECT_WORKERS',payload:skill};}export function filterJob(skill){return{type:'FILTER_JOBS',payload:skill};}
